description: Anchors and stabilizes energy, connecting you with the Earth and providing a sense of home and security.
Supports emotional fluidity, sensuality, and creative force. Prime 17 — the seer and the intuitive artist.
Aligns with personal will and directional clarity. Associated with Prime 19 – the path of sovereign leadership.
Known as the Love frequency. Heals, regenerates, and brings balance. Connects your vibration to Prime 13 — transformation through the heart.
Increases communication skills, honesty, and clear expression. Linked with Prime 17 — communicating vision.
